text: William didn't know if it was possible to love just one girl... but then Kate hit the town in a sexy dress and he came running back The true story behind THAT break - up - concluding our highly revealing series by PENNY JUNOR By PENNY JUNOR No Royal author has better insight into Prince William than PENNY JUNOR, who has used her unique contacts to write the most definitive ever account of his life in a major new biography. In the final part of our unmissable series, she reveals how William fell for Kate Middleton, but was scared of becoming too attached...
